title: Trot Music: From Old to New Again
summary: Trot is a type of Korean music that started a long time ago and was very popular. It has a special rhythm and singers often wear shiny suits and big hair. People used to think it was old-fashioned, but now it is becoming popular again. This is because people on social media are using AI to change K-pop songs into trot style. They make videos with AI pictures of singers, and many people watch these videos. Trot songs often talk about sad feelings like missing home or love. Some famous old singers like Nam Jin and Na Hoon-A made trot famous in the past. Today, new singers are trying to bring trot back through TV shows where they compete to be stars.

background_read: Trot is a traditional Korean music that started in the 1930s. It mixes Korean folk music with influences from Japan and the West. Singers often express deep emotions like sadness and longing in their songs. For a long time, young people thought it was old and not cool, but now it is getting attention again through online videos and competitions.
Article_Structure: WHO: Korean singers and social media users
WHAT: Trot music is making a comeback with AI and TV shows
WHERE: South Korea and on social media platforms
WHY: To revive an old music genre and attract new fans

perspectives.description: People who like the new trot trend think it is fun and brings old music to life with technology.
Some people worry that using AI changes the real feel of trot and might not respect the original songs.
